casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dwayne Demont HAIZLIP 345P16-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2017 James D. Concepcion, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Dwayne Dumont Haizlip, for Haizlip, Dwayne Dumont. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of May 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2017." Ervin, J. recused
